attributes.action: Make sure  all the local council elections go ahead in May 20205
attributes.additional_details: The government can not be allowed to change these local council elections in May 2025, to suit the needs of themselves. They need to be held accountable for making sure they are not using there powers to take the right of the British people due to there failures and knowing that they could be in trouble in May. The British public needs to have its votes as it has done every year. The government must not be allowed to dictate the councils areas and delay voting for there own gains
attributes.background: I want the government to be held accountable for making sure that all local council elections go ahead as planned and not be allowed to divert from this to suit there failures

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
